thread.section_title: Hotel Cervantes by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very Friendly Hotel -
thread.title_full: Very Friendly Hotel - Review of Hotel Cervantes by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Pelham W
title: Very Friendly Hotel -
text: All the staff I met at the hotel were very helpful and friendly. There is free coffee in the bar all of the time and free cocktails between 6pm and 8 pm. The standard room was adequte for a short stay. Breakfast was excellent even if breakfast area can get a little crowded. Would definitely stay here again.
